name: 辜炳達
objective: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
schedule:
W1 Course Intro
W2 Order words for emphasis
W3 Activate your verbs
W4 Watch those adverbs
W5 Take it easy on the -ings.
W6 Fear not the long sentence
W7 Establish a pattern, then give it a twist
W8 Perfect the simple over the technical
W9 Midterm clinic
W10 Play with words
W11 Give key words their space
W12 Pay attention to names
W13 Seek original images
W14 Riff on the creative languages of others
W15 Vary the lengths of paragraphs
W16 Climb up and down the ladder of abstraction
W17 Tune your voice
W18 Final
materials:
Writing Tools
They Say, I Say
